additional_info:
on central road 
 For sale is a land on a seaside in Grigoleti - 13514sq/m. The land is located along a sand seaside. The main entrance is from the central highway. Part of the property is covered with pine trees. The land can be used for various purposes (hotel, house building, villas etc), it is 5 min drive from popular Black Sea resort Kobuleti and 30 min drive from Batumi.
Besides rest and recreation one can enjoy unforgettable views of Grigoleti nature. Grigoleti village is located close to Kolkheti national park, where visitors can enjoy bird watching as well as hunting and fishing.
